title: Auth0 GitHub Deployment
name: auth0-github-deploy
author: auth0
description: This extension gives Auth0 customers the possibility to deploy Rules and Custom Database Connections from GitHub.

auth0.scopes: read:connections update:connections read:rules create:rules update:rules delete:rules
auth0.uninstallConfirmMessage: You are about to uninstall the "GitHub Deployment Extension". If you proceed any changes you make to your repository will no longer be deployed to Auth0. Do you want to continue?

GITHUB_REPOSITORY.description: The repository from which you want to deploy rules and database scripts

GITHUB_BRANCH.description: The branch we should monitor for commits

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Your personal access token for GitHub

SLACK_INCOMING_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Webhook URL for Slack used to notify you of successful and failed deployments
